name: Bubble Shooter - Pop Puzzle!
description:
Bubble Shooter - Pop Puzzle! is one of the most popular and classic bubble shooting game. Spend your holiday playing this awesome bubble shooting puzzle game and enjoy thousands of joyful levels wrapped with amazing boosts and power-ups. Let’s blast all the bubbles!

Help, these lovely birds need to be rescued! They are trapped by bubbles. Shoot, aim and match bubbles of the same to rescue them. Dig your fingers into this most exciting bubble shooting game ever! Show off your bubbles popping skills within Bubble Shooter Pop!

Tap the screen where you want to shoot the ball, blast and pop everything in your path and save the lovely baby birds. You should shoot bubbles carefully because you have limited bubbles in your hand.

Work your way through increasingly challenging puzzles and shoot the bubbles to pop the target. Group 3 or more bubbles together to size up the perfect blast shot! Using the amazingly powerful props to help you with the tricky levels. Boost your fun by opening sprees NOW!!

Features:
-Unlimited chances to explore your bubble world
-Over 1900 captivating levels with uniquely challenging obstacles
-Smooth and fantastic playing experience
-Delicate and well-designed bubble graphics
-Super easy to pick up but hard to fully master
-Small game size for downloading
-Endless fun to play

HOW TO PLAY Bubble Shooter pop bubbles game?
-Tap screen to match bubbles
-Aim and shoot strategically to collect all the bubbles
-Match and shoot bubbles to save cute baby birds
-Collect enough birds to level up
-Power-ups and special bubbles to help you blast tricky levels

This bubble shooting puzzle game is free to download. Bubbles Shooter game is completely free to play but some in-game items such as extra moves will require payment. 

Have fun receiving coins with Bubble Shooter Pop! Blast all bubbles and win every turn-based battles. Let’s enjoy the unstoppable fun in Bubble Shooter Pop puzzle adventure!
Now download this incredible bubble shooting game in App Store for FREE! Join with us and start your amazing bubble journey!
